mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sps_shopkeeper_house_property ( house_is_have, house_area, house_addr, shopkeeper_customerId, house_username, house_creat_time, house_update_time ) VALUES ( #{houseIsHave,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{houseAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopkeeperCustomerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseCreatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{houseUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
